member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_SHADER_DESC.pInputSignature
member.summary: Passed into CreateInputLayout. Only valid on a vertex shader or geometry shader. See .

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_SHADER_DESC.IsInline
member.summary: TRUE is the shader is defined inline; otherwise FALSE.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_SHADER_DESC.pBytecode
member.summary: A pointer to the compiled shader.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_SHADER_DESC.SODecl
member.summary: A string that contains a declaration of the stream output from a geometry shader.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_SHADER_DESC.NumInputSignatureEntries
member.summary: The number of entries in the input signature.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_SHADER_DESC.NumOutputSignatureEntries
member.summary: The number of entries in the output signature.
